title: Leveraging ChatGPT in Malaysian Primary Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and smartphone usage proficiency
context.additional_context: Foundational course focusing on designing science lessons using ChatGPT in Malaysian public education, emphasizing practical approaches implementable in smartphone-based limited environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain how to understand ChatGPT's basic functions and apply them to elementary science class questions
Identify at least three educational applications and ethical considerations of generative AI
Develop a plan for science concept exploration activities using ChatGPT in smartphone environments
Propose at least two strategies for maintaining academic integrity when using AI tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
